00001 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00002 ! Subroutine : VGrid
00003 ! Revision   : 1.0 (2008-06-15)
00004 ! Author     : Carlos Rosales Fernandez [carlos.rosales.fernandez(at)gmail.com]
00005 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

00036 !-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 
00038  SUBROUTINE VGrid
00039 
00040  USE Domain
00041  USE MPIParams
00042  USE MPI
00043  IMPLICIT NONE
00044 
00045 ! Local variables
00046  LOGICAL :: reorder
00047  INTEGER :: complete, direction, partial, shift, mpi_coords(1:mpi_dim)
00048  INTEGER :: xeast, xwest, ynorth, ysouth
00049  INTEGER :: MPI_ERR
00050  INTEGER, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: dims
00051  LOGICAL, DIMENSION(1:mpi_dim) :: periodic
00052 
00053 ! Basic parameters for the partitioning scheme
00054  dims(1)     = mpi_xdim
00055  dims(2)     = mpi_ydim
00056  periodic(1) = .true.
00057  periodic(2) = .true.
00058  reorder     = .true.
00059 
00060 ! Create the new virtual connectivity grid
00061  CALL MPI_CART_CREATE(MPI_COMM_WORLD, mpi_dim, dims, periodic, reorder, MPI_COMM_VGRID, MPI_ERR)
00062 
00063 ! Get this processor ID within the virtual grid
00064  CALL MPI_COMM_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, MPI_ERR)
00065  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, vproc, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00066 
00067 !--------- Compute domain limits [ (xl,xu) x (yl,yu) ] for this processor ------
00068 ! Partitioning in the x direction
00069  complete = (xmax - xmin) / dims(1)
00070  partial  = (xmax - xmin) - complete*dims(1)
00071  IF(mpi_coords(1) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00072    xl = xmin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(1)
00073    xu = xmin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) - 1
00074  ELSE
00075    xl = xmin + complete*mpi_coords(1) + partial
00076    xu = xmin + complete*(mpi_coords(1) + 1) + partial - 1
00077  END IF
00078  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(1) + 1,dims(1)) == 0) xu = xu + 1
00079 
00080 ! Partitioning in the y direction
00081  complete = (ymax - ymin) / dims(2)
00082  partial  = (ymax - ymin) - complete*dims(2)
00083  IF(mpi_coords(2) + 1 <= partial) THEN
00084    yl = ymin + (complete + 1)*mpi_coords(2)
00085    yu = ymin + (complete + 1)*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) - 1
00086  ELSE
00087    yl = ymin + complete*mpi_coords(2) + partial
00088    yu = ymin + complete*(mpi_coords(2) + 1) + partial - 1
00089  END IF
00090  IF(MOD(mpi_coords(2) + 1,dims(2)) == 0) yu = yu + 1
00091 
00092 ! Ghost layer limits (momentum grid)
00093  xlg  = xl - 1
00094  xug  = xu + 1 
00095  ylg  = yl - 1
00096  yug  = yu + 1
00097 
00098  xlg2 = xl - 2
00099  xug2 = xu + 2
00100  ylg2 = yl - 2
00101  yug2 = yu + 2
00102 
00103 ! Domain Size (order parameter grid)
00104  xmin_f = xmin
00105  ymin_f = ymin
00106  xmax_f = 2*xmax - 1
00107  ymax_f = 2*ymax - 1
00108 
00109  xOffset = 0
00110  yOffset = 0
00111  IF ( mpi_coords(1) > 0 ) xOffset = 1
00112  IF ( mpi_coords(2) > 0 ) yOffset = 1
00113 
00114  xl_f = 2*xl - 1 - xOffset
00115  xu_f = 2*xu - 1
00116  yl_f = 2*yl - 1 - yOffset
00117  yu_f = 2*yu - 1
00118 
00119 ! Ghost layer limits (order parameter grid)
00120  xlg_f  = xl_f - 1
00121  xug_f  = xu_f + 1
00122  ylg_f  = yl_f - 1
00123  yug_f  = yu_f + 1
00124 
00125  xlg2_f = xl_f - 2
00126  xug2_f = xu_f + 2
00127  ylg2_f = yl_f - 2
00128  yug2_f = yu_f + 2
00129 
00130  xlg3_f = xl_f - 3
00131  xug3_f = xu_f + 3
00132  ylg3_f = yl_f - 3
00133  yug3_f = yu_f + 3
00134 
00135 !--------- Determine neighbours of this processor ------------------------------
00136 ! MPI_CART counts dimensions using 0-based arithmetic so that
00137 ! direction = 0 -> x  |  direction = 1 -> y
00138  shift     = 1
00139  direction = 0
00140  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, west, east, MPI_ERR)
00141  direction = 1
00142  CALL MPI_CART_SHIFT(MPI_COMM_VGRID, direction, shift, south, north, MPI_ERR)
00143 
00144 ! Obtain coordinates of neighbours of this processor in the x and y directions
00145  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, east, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00146  xeast = mpi_coords(1)
00147  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, west, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00148  xwest = mpi_coords(1)
00149  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, north, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00150  ynorth = mpi_coords(2)
00151  CALL MPI_CART_COORDS(MPI_COMM_VGRID, south, mpi_dim, mpi_coords, MPI_ERR)
00152  ysouth = mpi_coords(2)
00153 
00154 ! Obtain the ranks of the diagonal neighbours
00155  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00156  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00157  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,ne,MPI_ERR)
00158  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00159  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00160  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,sw,MPI_ERR)
00161  mpi_coords(1) = xwest
00162  mpi_coords(2) = ynorth
00163  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,nw,MPI_ERR)
00164  mpi_coords(1) = xeast
00165  mpi_coords(2) = ysouth
00166  CALL MPI_CART_RANK(MPI_COMM_VGRID,mpi_coords,se,MPI_ERR)
00167 
00168  RETURN
00169  END SUBROUTINE VGrid
Generated on Sun Jun 15 17:06:05 2008 for LL-2D-DGR-MPI by  1.5.6
